com.kaiserware.sailingrace

Class SailTimerAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.kaiserware.sailingrace.SailTimerAPI

  • public class SailTimerAPI
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
    Helper Class to integrate the output from the SailTimerAPI app into this app to fetch the AWA and AWS from the SailTimer, Inc. Wind Anemometer (windex). Created by Volker Petersen in February 2016.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.content.BroadcastReceiver

        android.content.BroadcastReceiver.PendingResult

      static android.content.IntentFilter WindexBroadcastReceiverIntentFilter()
      - register the BroadcastReceiver in Fragment_RaceInfo.java Class using: private final BroadcastReceiver WindexBroadcastReceiver = new SailTimerAPI(para, appContext); - put this code into the Fragment_RaceInfo onResume() method registerReceiver(WindexBroadcastReceiver, WindexBroadcastReceiverIntentFilter()); - put this code into the Fragment_RaceInfo onPause() method unregisterReceiver(WindexBroadcastReceiver);

      • getHashCodeOnline

        public static void getHashCodeOnline(android.content.Context context,
                                     GlobalParameters para)
        Method to use the Volley asynchronous httpRequest library to fetch the Hash code from the SailTimer Inc. website. This Hash Code is required to decode the data transmitted from the Windex.
        Parameters:
        context - - the application context
        para - - the Object id of the Global Parameters singleton class
